meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the floc of yarn, thinking it was a tiny creature.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seemed to gather in a floc, creating a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The chef sprinkled a floc of herbs on top of the dish for added flavor.
